sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbackupresult ( BACKUP_RESULT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_FILE /* */ , STTUS /* */ , ERROR_INFO /* */ , EXECUT_BEGIN_TM /* */ , EXECUT_END_TM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #backupResultId# /* */ , #backupOpertId# /* */ , #backupFile# /* */ , #sttus# /* */ , #errorInfo# /* */ , #executBeginTm# /* */ , #executEndTm# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbackupresult SET BACKUP_RESULT_ID=#backupResultId# /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_ID=#backupOpertId# /* */ , BACKUP_FILE=#backupFile# /* */ , STTUS=#sttus# /* */ , ERROR_INFO=#errorInfo# /* */ , EXECUT_BEGIN_TM=#executBeginTm# /* */ , EXECUT_END_TM=#executEndTm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE BACKUP_RESULT_ID=#backupResultId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT BACKUP_RESULT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_FILE /* */ , STTUS /* */ , ERROR_INFO /* */ , EXECUT_BEGIN_TM /* */ , EXECUT_END_TM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbackupresult WHERE BACKUP_RESULT_ID=#backupResultId# /* */

SELECT BACKUP_RESULT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_FILE /* */ , STTUS /* */ , ERROR_INFO /* */ , EXECUT_BEGIN_TM /* */ , EXECUT_END_TM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbackupresult WHERE 1=1
BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BACKUP_OPERT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY BACKUP_RESULT_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbackupresult WHERE 1=1
BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BACKUP_OPERT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
